verses.name: Mark 15:32
verses.text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reviled him.

verses.name: Mark 15:33
verses.text: And when the sixth hour was come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.

verses.name: Mark 15:34
verses.text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?

verses.name: Mark 15:35
verses.text: And some of them that stood by, when they heard it, said, Behold, he calleth Elias.
